title: Job Vacancies at Baker Industries Limited
content:
Baker Industries Limited is a city of Industries providing solutions to the Nigerian market and looking to expand our reach to other countries across the globe. We do all things Real Estate, Technology, Hospitality and Agriculture.

We are recruiting to fill the following positions below:

1.) Accountant

Job Location: Sabo Yaba, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Responsibilities
     

        


     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	Prepare accurate monthly, quarterly, and annual financial reports.
	Manage accounts payable and receivable processes.
	Reconcile bank statements and ensure accurate ledger maintenance.
	Monitor financial transactions and ensure proper documentation.
	Assist in budget preparation and financial forecasting.
	Ensure compliance with relevant tax laws and statutory remittances (e.g., VAT, PAYE, WHT).
	Support internal and external audits.
	Maintain confidentiality and integrity of all financial data.


Requirements


	Minimum of B.Sc./HND in Accounting, Finance, or related field.
	3+ years of relevant accounting experience, preferably in real estate or a similar industry.
	Proficiency in accounting software (e.g., QuickBooks, Sage).
	Strong knowledge of Nigerian tax regulations and financial reporting standards.
	Excellent attention to detail, organizational, and analytical skills.
	Ability to work independently and meet tight deadlines.
	ICAN/ACCA qualification (in view or completed) is an added advantage.


Application Closing Date: 4th August, 2025.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their  CV and a brief cover letter to: hr@bakersindustries.io using “Application for Accountant Role” as the subject of the mail.

 


2.) UI / UX Designer + WordPress Developer

Job Location: Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

The Role


	We’re looking for a creative, tech-savvy UI/UX Designer with WordPress skills to design and build responsive, high-converting web pages.
	You’ll work closely with marketing team to create landing pages, property listings, and lead funnels.


What You’ll Do


	Design pages in Figma (or similar)
	Build responsive UIs in WordPress
	Customize themes using Elementor, or custom code
	Optimize for speed and mobile
	Maintain consistent, user-focused design


Requirements


	1–2 relevant project links
	Proficient in Figma
	Experience with WordPress development and plugins
	Mobile-first, conversion-focused mindset
	Your portfolio or website
	A Figma file or link to a favorite design/dev project
	Close proximity to Yaba is an added advantage.


Application Closing Date: 15th August, 2025.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their resume to: hr@bakerindustries.io using the Job Position as the subject of the email.

 

 

3.) Social Media Manager

Job Location: Lagos
Employment Type: Full Time

Role Description


	This is a full-time hybrid role for a Social Media Manager located in Lagos, with some work-from-home flexibility.
	The Social Media Manager will be responsible for managing and optimizing social media platforms, developing and executing content strategies, creating engaging content, and monitoring social media trends.
	The Social Media Manager will collaborate with various departments to enhance communication and online presence.


Qualifications


	Bachelor's Degree in Marketing, Communications, or a related field
	Proficiency in Social Media Marketing and Social Media Optimization (SMO)
	Strong Communication and Writing skills
	Experience in developing and implementing Content Strategies
	Ability to analyze social media trends and metrics
	Excellent organizational and multitasking skills
	Ability to work in a hybrid environment
	Familiarity with the real estate, technology, hospitality, or agriculture industries is a plus.


Application Closing Date: 15th August, 2025.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their resume to: kenny.adelakun@bakerindustries.io using the Job Position as the subject of the email.
